content: thread for sewing eyes make two pieces eye r1 white 5 single_crochet in magic_ring 5 sts eye r2 white *increase* repeat 5 times 10 sts eye r3 white 10 single_crochet 10 sts fasten_off leave long thread for sewing collar work in spiral rounds collar r1 yellow make ring with 16 chain 16 sts or your choice collar r2 yellow single_crochet 16 16 sts collar r3 yellow single_crochet 16 16 sts fasten_off leave long thread for sewing pag e 7 | 9 crochet daschund bookmark | fonalart ears make two pieces ear r1 brown chain 12 12 sts ear r2 brown skip 1 st single_crochet 10 3 single_crochet in the last 24 sts st single_crochet 11 to the other side of the single_crochet chain ear r3 brown turn slip_stitch single_crochet 11 increase increase increase 27 sts this is the downside of single_crochet 10 the ear fasten_off leave long thread for sewing saw the ears and the eyes on the head embroider the eyes with the black yarn with one or two stitches i ve made a normal and a knot stitch from the bottom put on the dog s collar pag e 8 | 9 crochet daschund bookmark | fonalart fonalart thank you for crocheting my pattern pag e 9 | 9
